He said that EVE .Dlls provided here

So you need only RSS.

OK, I wasn't sure because I didn't see a period between "RSS 10.0.2" and "EVE .Dlls".

OK, I wasn't sure because I didn't see a period between "RSS 10.0.2" and "EVE .Dlls".

Sorry, view it in raw, makes more sense.

hi guys!!!

the other day I was wondering something and I don't know if you are working on it pingopete (or if anyone else is) but thought it'd be cool (sorry if this is not the place to be asking this): how would one go about trying to recreate the shadow that Saturn casts on its rings to render them invisible when blocking the sun? is this something that could be done?

hi guys!!!

the other day I was wondering something and I don't know if you are working on it pingopete (or if anyone else is) but thought it'd be cool (sorry if this is not the place to be asking this): how would one go about trying to recreate the shadow that Saturn casts on its rings to render them invisible when blocking the sun? is this something that could be done?

http://www.nasa.gov/sites/default/files/saturn20131017.jpg

I plan on adding this as an option.
ahh great rbray!!! i knew one of the pros was on it!!! thanks a million!

I plan on adding this as an option.

Do you also plan to make eclipse shadows on bodies? That would have been cool

I plan on adding this as an option.

Awesome! Are you gonna have a ring system in EVE at some point?!

I spoke to K-Creator (who works on kittopiaSpace that provides rings) about this exact thing - body shadowing on rings and ring shadows on bodies; he said he'd look into it but I haven't heard much since.

I was able to roughly get some ring shadows onto planets by creating an shadowed but invisible-otherwise cloud layer at the rings, though it only worked in one direction, this would be great to add in EVE if rings were to be added as there is already a beautiful shadow system rbray has added

Testing of some new volumetric features (intentional/non-intentional) rain effect, cloud detail shadows, terrain shader textures and scatterer instead of the EVE atmosphere shader:

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Hot damn! That is just overwhelmingly pretty.

Awesome! Are you gonna have a ring system in EVE at some point?!

I spoke to K-Creator (who works on kittopiaSpace that provides rings) about this exact thing - body shadowing on rings and ring shadows on bodies; he said he'd look into it but I haven't heard much since.

http://i.imgur.com/pZSU6MT.png

I was able to roughly get some ring shadows onto planets by creating an shadowed but invisible-otherwise cloud layer at the rings, though it only worked in one direction, this would be great to add in EVE if rings were to be added as there is already a beautiful shadow system rbray has added

That's the plan!

....wowsers.

Pingopete: Are your cfgs synced with github? I was going to make a pass fixing some MM issues in them, but don't want to do it to out of date configs... :]

....wowsers.

Pingopete: Are your cfgs synced with github? I was going to make a pass fixing some MM issues in them, but don't want to do it to out of date configs... :]

uhhh nooooo sorry, please don't wait on me though, I have allot of updating to do in the near future .. (or would you need too, and is that the point?) my RSS configs on git aren't even updated to RSS 10.1 :S

Edited July 20, 2015 by pingopete
pingopete excellent work I would also say that your Saturn's rings look way better than stock one.

I've been tracking progress of this amazing mod for some time. Now in 1.0.4 I tried to install it albeit with little result. Can someone write precise instructions what files to download and how to install them. GitHub is overwhelming.

Pingopete, you are awesome, but please, adjust instructions in the readme so I don't have to think through every sentence for 15 minutes.
Will Real Visual Enchancements work in KSP version 1.0.4 with Real Solar System?
Pete: replied on github.
would be great if one could upload a zipped GameData with a working RSS mod

would be great if one could upload a zipped GameData with a working RSS mod

I've successfully installed RSS countless times. What seems to be the issue?

I've successfully installed RSS countless times. What seems to be the issue?
i'm afraid i have to admit, the issue is me lol

i just mean to share that idea that passed throught my head, i just thought it's easier to share the gamedata folder, sort of plug-n-play

don't get me wrong, i'm not complaining, crying or anything like this
ahhhhhh DAMN pingopete, this is looking FANTASTIC !!!!!!!!!!!! keep up the good work, shout if you need anything

I read the post twice, and still counldn't find the dl, also, the thing where you said that you'll take down dls, is that only for the dev ver? Or also for the 0.2.1 "Stable" Version? Which would explain why I can't find it.

I'm just terrible at finding DL links, sorry.

I read the post twice, and still counldn't find the dl, also, the thing where you said that you'll take down dls, is that only for the dev ver? Or also for the 0.2.1 "Stable" Version? Which would explain why I can't find it.

I'm just terrible at finding DL links, sorry.

its a little tricky in github for us we don't use it, I also spent a generous amount of minutes trying to figure out the readme.md and the downloads.

on the right hand side of the screen you have a download button that reads 'Download ZIP'... thats the zip you are looking for, the "master.zip" quoted in the instructions
